message.name: ERR_WORKSPACE_SERVICES_DATA_MAPPING
message.locale: APROCER028: CDME Mapping Error. Workspace Services Data Mapping Error. Error occurred mapping the following XML data: %1s

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_PRIMARY_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: APROCER029: CDME Mapping Error. Workspace Services Data Mapping Error: Cannot have multiple primary participants

message.name: ERR_NO_PROGRAMS_APPLIED_FOR
message.locale: APROCER030: CDME Mapping Error. Workspace Services Data Mapping Error: No programs have been applied for.

message.name: ERR_PROSPECT_PERSON_MAPPINGS
message.locale: APROCER031: CDME Mapping Error. Workspace Services Data Mapping Error: An error occurred while attempting to map to Person data.

message.name: ERR_RELATIONSHIP_MAPPINGS
message.locale: APROCER032: CDME Mapping Error. Workspace Services Data Mapping Error: An error occurred while attempting to map to Relationship data.

message.name: ERR_CREATING_CASES
message.locale: APROCER033: CDME Mapping Error. Workspace Services Data Mapping Error: An error occurred while creating Cases.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_MAPPINGS
message.locale: APROCER034: CDME Mapping Error. Workspace Services Data Mapping Error: An error occurred while creating evidence.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_MAPPINGS_NO_PROGRAMS
message.locale: APROCER035: CDME Mapping Error. Workspace Services Data Mapping Error: No programs have been applied for.

message.name: ERR_READING_FROM_DATASTORE
message.locale: APROCER036: CDME Mapping Error. Workspace Services Data Mapping Error: An error occurred reading data from the datastore.

message.name: ERR_NO_INTEGRATED_CASE_OF_REQUIRED_TYPE
message.locale: APROCER037: CDME Mapping Error. Workspace Services Data Mapping Error: The program type %1s requires an integrated case of type %2s to be created but none exists.

message.name: ERR_NO_CASE_OF_REQUIRED_TYPE
message.locale: APROCER038: CDME Mapping Error. Workspace Services Data Mapping Error: The program type %1s requires a %2c of type %3s to be created but none exists.

message.locale: APROCER041: CDME Mapping Error. Workflow ProcessInstanceID:
